Layout/SpaceInsideReferenceBrackets.description:
Description

Checks the spacing inside referential brackets.
Layout/SpaceInsideReferenceBrackets.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForEmptyBrackets: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForEmptyBrackets: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
